archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Generate Customer Problem Management Reports
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process generates Customer Problem management reports that provide management reports and any specialized summaries of the efficiency and effectiveness of the overall Customer Problem Management process. These specialized summaries could be specific reports required by specific audiences. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory This process generates Customer Problem management reports that provide management reports and any specialized summaries of the efficiency and effectiveness of the overall Customer Problem Management process.These specialized summaries could be specific reports required by specific audiences.
